title: Tier 15

contents:
These equipment sets will be strong in the majority of situations, however you may find slightly better results with your heroes using slightly different gear and / or spirits. The easy example is weapons - do NOT blindly follow these if your hero has a weapon skill that is not compatible with this set (see the mini-guide). You may value slightly different stat thresholds or need / want to use cheaper / budget alternatives of the items listed here. These are fine choices of course, but will require testing of your own.
Also note that the equipment loadouts listed on this page were designed assuming the hero is promoted. Certain classes gain access to new equipment options when promoted that allow for a superior equipment setup than their unpromoted counterparts. If your hero is NOT promoted, the gear set will be similar but you may need to make some substitutions. We will not be providing these alternatives here unless it’s a major variation.
For advice on individual heroes, or your entire roster, join the STC Discord, and let us know. We are happy to help!
Fighters Soldier/Mercenary Barbarian/Chieftain Knight/Lord Ranger/Warden Samurai/Daimyo Berserker/Jarl Dark Knight/Death Knight Rogues Thief/Trickster Monk/Grandmaster Musketeer/Conquistador Wanderer/Pathfinder Ninja/Sensei Dancer/Acrobat Velite/Praetorian Spellcasters Mage/Archmage Cleric/Bishop Druid/Arch Druid Sorcerer/Warlock Spellblade/Spellknight Geomancer/Astramancer Chronomancer/Fateweaver 战士 Krampus spirit is a great option if you have high rarity equipment (Epic/Legendary) and have too much defensive stats 士兵 / 雇佣兵 信息 Enchant the weapon with Titan if promoted Enchant remaining items with Bahamut, Ouroboros, or Mammoth If unsure/not simming go with Ouroboros Mammoth is best option if you’re happy with your survival rate already © 2026 STC Hub    |    CC BY-NC-ND 4.0    15

contents:
The builds on this page have been removed.
The Hypermax / Dragon Invasion builds have proven to be confusing, controversial, and misleading.
The STC team has decided that it is best to remove these builds to help prevent further confusion. Specifically, the misconception that star power has anything to do with a good hero.
For information on balanced heroes, please refer to the BiS heroes page or the tl;dr page.
For advice on individual heroes, or your entire roster, join the STC Discord, and let us know. We are happy to help!
